sections.description:
Installing and Activating the Plugin

Build WordPress sites ten times faster with Kitz Pro Builder.
  • Step 1 Navigate to any page that has Divi enabled, and click “Kitz” on the topbar.
  • Step 2 You will now enter the builder.
  • Step 3 On the sidebar, choose “Sections” or “Layouts”. You can also add additional Divi-enabled pages inside the builder.
  • Step 4 Save the page upon exit, and modify the page via the standard Divi builder.
sections.installation:
Installing and Activating the Plugin

  • Step 1 Download the plugin via the Kitz Pro Builder dashboard
  • Step 2 Install on a WordPress site with Divi Theme or Divi Kitz Builder plugin
  • Step 3 Copy the API Key from the dashboard under “Account Summary”
  • Step 4 Navigate to your new website, and login to the WP-Admin dashboard
  • Step 5 Navigate to the Kitz Pro Builder dashboard page
  • Step 6 Enter your account email and your AP Key, and click “Connect”
  • Step 7 If your connection is successful, you will receive a notification, and your files appear when you activate the Kitz Pro Builder.
  • Step 8 Connect your dropbox & save your data in dropbox which you will get in the builder.
sections.changelog:
1.0 – 16 December, 2022

  • Bug fixes.
  • Initital release.
  • Now User can save layout into their directory.
  • Meet new functionality
  • User can save section on their Kitz Pro Builder, Just need to click on save icon
